description: 1. To feed someone until full. 2. To satisfy emotional or sexual desires.

examples.chinese: 肚子喂饱饱才有力气走路路
examples.translation: Only when the stomach is full do you have the strength to walk.

examples.chinese: 不仅满足你的胃,也要喂饱你的心
examples.translation: Not only satisfy your stomach, but also feed your heart.

examples.chinese: 我没法喂饱你,但我很爱你
examples.translation: I can't satisfy you (financially/materially), but I love you very much.

examples.chinese: 夫妻两人的爱情真的太让人羡慕了,又是被狗粮喂饱的一天
examples.translation: The couple's love is so enviable, another day fed full by dog food (PDA).
